## normalize() function

 Truncates `wad` to appropriate decimals then converts to a floating point number

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function normalize(wad: number, decimals: number): number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  wad | number |  |
|  decimals | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
